RemediationStrings.Title: CrowdStrike Falcon Service must be Running
RemediationStrings.Description: The CrowdStrike Falcon Service (CSFalconService) must be in a Running state for endpoint protection compliance. Current status: {ActualValue}. Please ensure the CrowdStrike Falcon agent is properly installed and the service is started.

RemediationStrings.Title: CrowdStrike Falcon Service must be installed
RemediationStrings.Description: The CrowdStrike Falcon Service (CSFalconService) must be installed on this device. Current status: Service not found. Please install the CrowdStrike Falcon agent to meet endpoint protection requirements.
